name: nbgreene
text: Bribing friends to share breakfast and Braveheart with you is a good way to go.

text: Ray is willing to pay Teodor 100 bucks to watch Braveheart with him.

text: Ray will bribe you not to look after a child.

text: ARBLE GABBLE GOBBLE GREEBLE

name: bpmead
text: Beef also once described something as "grelicious"

name: tombsgrave
text: More poisons need to glow green.

name: straw
text:
When I was at Boy Scout camp the disinfectant cocktail for the latrines was neon yellow. Shit glowed. It actually glowed in daylight even.

Bottom line, two kids got dared to drink it and everyone got to go home before the end of the week.

name: unquotable
text: That's the bottom line to my music camp story too!

name: evolume
text: i didn't want to go home. they let us shoot real guns there!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
idea for a drink: 3-mile-island iced tea.

glowy green mixture at the bottom of the glass.
glowy yellow mix in the top half of the glass.

glow glow=delicious? very yes.
of course it's all about making these colors stay separate until it's served. then you drink it and it turns way neon yellow 'cos, hey, you mixed them together and they reacted in an awesome way!

but maybe that's more glowy stuff than anybody could handle. maybe you'd order it when you're way past trashed. then you couldn't tell that it tasted like death.

name: spicyponyhead
text: The end. No moral.

name: nonentity
text: This is the second strip where Ray mentions 45 degree angles. The first, of course, is a classic.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: oh necessarily.

name: slanger
text: This makes me wish Ray was my friend so hard.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I am always trying to get my friends to watch Bravehart and yell at the tv with me but I can't offer them one hundred dollar bills so usually it is just me on my own.

name: tragicone
text: considering you are a beautiful girl, contact me for my phone number upon which we will plan to watch braveheart and yell at the tv.

name: blarghamagarky
text:
This is the second time I have been assessed as attractive on asset bar from a 50x50 pixel image. Nice

I only watch Bravehart with dudes who want specifically to watch Bravehart and not smell my hair so up yours if you are one of those dudes (but not up yours if not)

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, goatmasterflash, Vondicus, NeoNaoNeo, milkpants, JonMW, Fcannon, charchar, achilleselbow, Doc_Rostov, AidenS123)

name: blarghamagarky
text: you are not invited to my party

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by zcross00, milkpants, JonMW, Doc_Rostov)

name: tragicone
text: I am nothing like this man. I do not wish to smell your hair. Not while braveheart is happening in the very least.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I... don't believe you

name: tragicone
text: I am sorry you feel that way. They are both separate and sacred events though, in my mind. One being the smelling of a womans hair while holding her in a deep embrace and the other being watch Braveheart and yelling at the screen. I am deeply saddened. I am no Nolan from the internet. You need not hire a variety of men to make a death relationship with my soul.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by zcross00, milkpants, Lumus, MrFlunchy)

name: blarghamagarky
text: orgazmo. well done sir

name: soticoto
text: Chubb for thou.

name: soticoto
text:
Or "thee".
I screwed up there.

name: tragicone
text: Athankyou!

name: soticoto
text: You been playing Puyo Puyo?

name: tragicone
text: no I have not. Why do you ask?

name: tragicone
text: And athankyou.

name: wulvaine
text: Soticoto, you continue to disturb me more and more the further comments of yours I discover.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 762, milkpants, Lumus, logic, Doc_Rostov)

name: achilleselbow
text: He doesn't disturb me. It comes off as pretty awkward and contrived and just ruins the whole flow of the thread. Soticoto is like that guy who'll walk up to a bunch of people laughing and having a good time at a party and start rattling off something about serial killers in a desperate bid for attention.

name: tragicone
text: And you like the professor brothers.

name: tekende
text: achilleselbow has hit the nail on the head here.

name: slanger
text: Dang blarghamagarky, you are always getting internet-courted on here. I guess because you are one of the few "real" ladies.  (I'm a lady too but I don't think anyone knows it because I have disguised myself as an owl).  Anyway, text messages and finding extra quarters in my pocket are my version of Ray's party :(

name: tekende
text: We need to start a club for guys (girls too, I guess, if it's happened) who have told blarghamagarky that she is attractive. So far that club would include tragicone and me. Who else?

name: blarghamagarky
text: you could make a wikipedia page

name: tekende
text: Or--or a Facebook group!

name: bjorntd
text: Oh snap. Is there an achewood facebook group? I need to find this out right now.

name: bjorntd
text: There is! My life is complete.

name: blarghamagarky
text: oh no

name: tekende
text: Sweet. I have joined the group.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: I guess what we're all trying to say blarghamagarky, is, I Wish To Dine In Your Private Restaurant.

name: charchar
text: I am a lady disguised as me

name: slanger
text: Rimbaud?  Don't freeze to death in the mountains...

text: -=It is too late=-

name: slanger
text: OHHHHH...shiiiiit

name: phy
text: A geometrically arranged hundo is essential to the presentation of a good fontina omelette.

name: atmus
text: The classy thing to do when confronted with a hundred dollar bill at breakfast provided by your friend is to break it into change, as complicated in denomination as possible.

name: molesticide
text: why?

name: philosophe
text: If you have to ask...

name: tragicone
text: you'll never know.

name: mjfitzge
text: yes, let's watch that 3 hour movie again.

name: presterjohn
text: I'm not having a kid until I know I can read her Rock Star Soccer Robot 9 at bedtime. Make it happen!

name: agentj
text: Most tragedies begin with a missed tuck-in.

name: soticoto
text:

That and my curious Braveheart memories (see earlier comment).
